ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars RPG
ygData.msgSnippet: (Icedemon, do to my intuition and the fact that the Council has told you your latest post was nothing but a lot of moding, I won t be posting for your attacks,

From: KSLawdogg@...

(Icedemon, do to my intuition and the fact that the Council has told you your 
latest post was nothing but a lot of moding, I won't be posting for your 
attacks, they were just plain moding at its worst)


Koga Shuko/Serpentor/Scattershot/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Anubis/Hades/Unitron/Ramhorn/Beachcomber/Smokescreen/Sixshot:



Koga Shuko raised his rifle, firing three bolts off at Ramhorn, sending the 
Maximal falling to the ground.

---

Anubis raised his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at the Ark.

---

Hades fired three laser bolts, blowing apart one of the last autoguns.

---

"Their defenses are broken!  Let the slaughter begin!" Koga Shuko 
pre-emptively said, chuckling.

---

"ROCK AND ROLL!!!" a voice screamed.

All the Newcomers' attention went to the source of the voice.

"What the...?" Koga Shuko asked aloud, seeing Scattershot descending rapidly 
in his robot mode...wearing...some Predacon's head!

"Scattershot!  That traitor!  I signed him on as my soldier!  ATTACK!" Koga 
Shuko yelled, firing two optic blasts, each hitting Scattershot in the 
abdomen, but he ignored it.

Unitron raised both lasers, raising an arm as cover as 20 explosive bullets 
pelted his armor, sending him stumbling back.   

Scattershot landed, uppercutting Unitron, quickly followed up by a roundhouse 
kick, sending the Newcomer crashing to the ground.  Two laser bolts struck 
him, not even fazing him.  "Fools!  I have the power of myself AND 
DeathStorm!  I am a god!"

(In truth, Scattershot disabled his pain circuitry, so he isn't going to be 
slown down by pain, of course, if you blow off a leg, it won't matter if he 
can't feel the pain)

-----

Beachcomber took Smokescreen, putting him in a CR chamber.  He looked to 
Prowl.  "Let's go!" he yelled, raising his heavy laser rifle, charging for 
the battle.

-----

Nemesis Enforcer hovered in the air for a moment.  "By the Pit!  That fool is 
wearing DeathStorm's head as a hat!?  Hmmm...I should've thought of that!" 
Nemesis Enforcer said, raising his rifle and taking aim.
